portfolio.title: Our portfolio features a diverse array of digital products crucial for the growth of contemporary businesses. Showcasing B2B solutions,<highlight> B2C mobile apps, and full-cycle projects, our work spans early-stage startups to established enterprises at different growth stages</highlight>
projects: A digital e-wallet mobile app offering a gamified experience, now utilized at over 260 fueling stations. Users can effortlessly top-up, play games, find stations, send credit to others, and earn points for their activities,  level up their profiles, and unlock exclusive rewards

An internal gamified well-being app for Bank Muscat, designed to encourage fitness through rewarding activities. The app fosters friendly competition among employees and departments, promoting a healthy lifestyle.

A multifaceted digital project for Oman‚Äôs official participation in Expo 2020 Dubai. This includes creating an official website and a mobile virtual experience among others, offering users an engaging and immersive showcase of Sultanate Oman‚Äôs participation.
